page.title: 10Languages used in Wembley
page.content:
In our class I made a survey on languages. I went round and asked the children which language was {mostly {spoken at home between them and their {parents.}
Nineteen people speak only English at home,7 people speak Gujerati, 1 person only Bangla,1 person Punjabi, 1 person Greek and 1 person Arabic.
This means that 11 people speak more than 2 languages and some can read and write in them as well.
At our new secondary schools we will have the opportunity to learn French, German, Spanish or Gujerati.
